headline: Nebius signs $17.4 billion AI infrastructure deal with Microsoft, shares jump
summary: The deal underscores the surging demand for high-performance AI compute, as companies invest heavily to bolster their AI infrastructure.  Microsoft may also acquire additional services capacity under the deal, bringing the total contract value to about $19.4 billion.  Nebius offers AI developers the computing, storage, managed services and tools they need to build, tune and run their AI models, with the help of its cloud software architecture and in-house designed hardware.

raw.headline: Nebius signs $17.4 billion AI infrastructure deal with Microsoft, shares jump
raw.summary: The deal underscores the surging demand for high-performance AI compute, as companies invest heavily to bolster their AI infrastructure.  Microsoft may also acquire additional services capacity under the deal, bringing the total contract value to about $19.4 billion.  Nebius offers AI developers the computing, storage, managed services and tools they need to build, tune and run their AI models, with the help of its cloud software architecture and in-house designed hardware.

headline: Only 4 S&P 500 Sectors Are Rising
summary: Of the 11 major S&P 500 sectors, only tech, consumer discretionary, industrials, and communication services were rising.  Tech was the clear leader with a gain of 1%, followed by consumer discretionary with a 0.7% gain.  Industrials were up 0.3%, while communication services were up 0.1%.

headline: Amazon And Microsoft Engineers Quit At 23 To Launch AI Startup Bluejay, Raise $4 Million With Y Combinator And Floodgate
